document_name: PA Support to Center of Govt. ProDoc.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/AFG/00040864/PA Support to Center of Govt. ProDoc.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1:  The buildings that house the OAA and CoS have been repaired or reconstructed to international standards according to a comprehensive architectural design for each building and their immediate surrounding grounds
Output 2: Critical administrative work processes are streamlined, predictable, timely and transparent
Output 3: The new CoS and OAA organizational structures are implemented per the PRR design
Output 4: All employees who required additional training in order to perform their jobs have received the necessary training
Output 5: Both the OAA and CoS have the necessary information technology and communications infrastructure to function at international standards
Output 6: Policy facilitation and decision making procedures are clear, effective and working as designed
outputs.output_title: Support to the Center of Gov

project_descr: Preparatory Assistance for Support of the Center of Govt.
project_title: Support to the Center of Government
